full_text: In the event that the source of the allegation is neither of the two women mentioned above, if you would provide me with the name of the person, or persons, making the claim, I will check with the relevant investigators and follow through until we are satisfied that we have gotten to the bottom of this matter. I trust the information provided in this letter is helpful to you as we all try to bring this difficult period to a close. Sincerely, Alan Dershowitz Alan Dershowitz Enclosures cc: Barry Krischer Lanna Belohlavek Daliah Weiss 07/26/17 Page 56 of 131 Public Records Request No.: 17-295 DOJ-OGR-00030523
